law.catch_line: Court may order interested parties summoned.
law.text: The court to which a will is offered for probate may cause all persons interested in the probate to be summoned to appear on a certain day.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4857.
